bibl.title: Frustula Beineckiana.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: 1. P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 1364. Administrative Letter. Provenance unknown, late fourth or early fifth century. - 2. Inv. 153. Work Contract. Oxyrhynchite nome, sixth century. - 3. Inv. 610. Loan of Wheat. Arsinoite nome?, sixth century. - 4. Inv. 4187. Loan or Sale on Delivery of Wine. Arsinoite nome, seventh century. - 5. Inv. 4705. Invocation and Dating Formula (Scribal Practice?). Hermopolite nome?, 31 Dec. or 1 Jan. 602-609. - 6. Inv. 2989. Receipt Between Monks. Hermopolite nome, late sixth century. - Avec résumé en anglais.

Hermopolite nome, late sixth century. - Avec résumé en anglais.
